title: The Adventures of Cefa the Cat, Norman Joins the Group
description: “Norman Joins the Group” is the third book in the children’s picture book series “The Adventures of Cefa the Cat. Cefa and Bart are playing in the back yard. They are trying to decide what Drugu is doing with a pile of rocks. Suddenly Bart sees something moving in one of the bushes. He is curious and wants to explore but Cefa is not sure. What if the thing that is moving is not friendly? What if it wants to hurt Bart? But Bart is fearless and decides to explore regardless. Who does Bart find there? Who is Norman? Is he mean or will he become a friend too?
author: Cristine Caton
